snippet: Twelve people died and at least 60 more were injured, officials said Tuesday, in an explosion in the center of Rosario, Argentina’s third-largest city, with 1.2 million people.
abstract: Twelve people die and at least 60 more are injured in gas leak-related explosion in the center of Rosario, Argentina; fifteen people remain missing.
lead_paragraph: Twelve people died and at least 60 more were injured, officials said Tuesday, in an explosion in the center of Rosario, Argentina’s third-largest city, with 1.2 million people.

headline.main: Argentina: Gas Leak Causes Deadly Residential Blast
headline.print_headline: Argentina: Gas Leak Causes Deadly Residential Blast
